MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 07-JAN-2021 20:44.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the WA7 postcode area of Runcorn affecting properties in Trafford Crescent and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:41am on the 7th January 2021.
